articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: Final Virgin Galactic test flight paves way for paying customers - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Company celebrates as it completes what is likely the final test before commercial space tourism operations begin.
articles.content:
Virgin Galactic has successfully carried out its first spaceflight in nearly two years, the company says, after an enhancement period to make safety upgrades to its fleet.

articles.title: Solar investment outshines oil as race for clean energy heats up - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: High oil and gas prices and worries about supplies have seen spending on renewables leap ahead of fossil fuels.
articles.content:
Investment in solar power is expected to overtake oil for the first time this year as clean energy spending outpaces that for fossil fuels.
